title: Can I sit in the masjid & make dhikr while on menses? | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: Austria says when I'm on Umbra if I get my menses can I sit in the Masjid and do thicker or should I not sit in the Masjid no the most authentic opinion of scholars is that a woman in her menses may not enter the boundaries of Masjid so neither entered nor sit in it at all
